body_content.explanation: a wild plant that is a weed (= unwanted plant) in gardens and fields:
examples: If the area contains horsetail, it is better not to try growing perennial plants in it until you have been clearing out this weed for some years.
The horsetails are plants from prehistoric times that have survived almost unchanged for millions of years.
The swamps through which the dinosaurs waded were thick with great horsetail and clubmoss trees.
